TopicTitle: I no longer dream of space?!

Articles.Content:
Hi!

I've created this account just to ask about something that has been bothering me since recent forum DDoS attacks and "backup corruption" forcing devs to roll back to October 2012:

What the hell happened to the "I dream of space" contest?! You can win suborbital flight and not even a single contestant complains anywhere on the forums about complete deletion of this thread?

I'm starting to think that this "attack" may have been more convenient for some people than carrying on with picking up a winner -.-

What do you guys think about it? Have I missed something?

Cheers, Bob
Well it was over in February anyway, so it doesn't really matter if it exists anymore or not.

The contest is long over and winners were announced. Someone might be able to dig some of the posts out of Google cache, but I am afraid that we've lost all that content.

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
unfortunately that was the month I joined. I had over 300 posts before.

Ok then! Thanks for clearing that up!

I was just worried that those guys were hung out to dry
